about_the_game:
Dive into an eerie first-person horror adventure crafted in Unreal Engine, blending platforming and collectathon elements with a compelling narrative and classic horror gameplay mechanics.

Story Overview:

  • Waking Nightmare: You, the player, are jolted awake in the middle of the night by an unsettling sound.

  • Mysterious Pursuer: Encounter Simon, the yellow Sprunki, who chases you around your house and drags you into the eerie world of the Sprunkis.

  • Colorful Yet Terrifying World: Discover a forest inhabited by the colorful Sprunkis, once a happy community now shattered.

  • Face the Betrayer: Confront the sinister entity known as Black, who has betrayed and massacred the Sprunkis.

  • Witness Atrocities: Experience the horrifying malformations inflicted upon the Sprunkis.

  • Escape the Nightmare: Navigate through puzzles and platforming challenges as you strive to escape the Sprunkis' world and return to the safety of your home.

Key Features:

  • Immersive First-Person Horror: Experience a chilling atmosphere with a strong focus on narrative and exploration.

  • Platforming and Collectathon Elements: Engage in platforming challenges and collect items crucial to your escape.

  • Classic Indie Horror Puzzles: Solve a variety of puzzles reminiscent of beloved indie horror games.

  • Engaging Narrative: Uncover the story of the Sprunkis and their tragic fate through environmental storytelling.

  • Atmospheric Visuals and Sound: Enjoy detailed environments and a haunting soundtrack that enhances the horror experience.

Prepare yourself for a gripping horror adventure where every corner hides a new terror, and your wits are your best ally in escaping the nightmare world of the Sprunkis.

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050Ti Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
